title: Is it possible to downgrade pixel 2 verizon from android 11 to 8 at least 9?
content: Recently I updated my pixel 2 to android 11 and i'm very happy because of battery life and some bugs. I've tried to use different instructions from the internet but not lucky... Is it possible to downgrade my pixel 2? I have a verizon version and as I know it is not good)
